text:
That option is already enabled by me.

And when I click it all it does is change the font as far as I can tell.
There is no syntax highlighting or particular formatting of the code snippet I want to write.

Is there something in particular I need to do when I use this function, like define which language I'm using?
I haven't been able to find much in terms of documentation about the code format and what little I did seems to be a bit outdated.
